headline: MSCI Equity Indexes February 2026 Index Review
summary: LONDON, February 11, 2026--MSCI Inc. (NYSE: MSCI), a leading provider of critical decision support tools and services for the global investment community, announced the results of the February 2026 Index Review for the MSCI Equity Indexes. All changes will be implemented as of the close of February 27, 2026.

headline: Assessing MSCI (MSCI) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness And Growth Narrative Assumptions
summary: Why MSCI Is On Investors’ Radar Today MSCI (MSCI) has drawn fresh attention after a period of weaker share performance, with the stock showing negative returns over the past week, month, past 3 months and year despite positive reported growth in revenue and net income. See our latest analysis for MSCI. With the latest share price at $515.66 and a 1 day share price return of 7.82% decline capping a 30 day share price return of 11.27% decline, recent momentum has clearly been fading. This...

headline: Is MSCI (MSCI) Offering A Fair Entry After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether MSCI at around US$515 per share is offering good value or asking too much, you are not alone. The stock has seen an 11.3% decline over the past week and past month, is down 8.8% year to date and is 9.5% lower over the last year, even though the 5 year return sits at 23.1%. Recent coverage has focused on MSCI's role as a major index and analytics provider, with attention on how shifts in investor interest toward indexed products and ESG related benchmarks affect...
